title: Bug Hunter Referral Program
subtitle: Become a valued partner and join mission to secure the digital world by participating in our Referral Program.
text: This initiative rewards you for connecting skilled bug hunters and cybersecurity experts who have a shared vision with this community, creating a safer digital ecosystem while unlocking exciting earning opportunities.

features.title: Referral Bonus
features.text: Rewarding Referrals: Earn a 5% referral bonus on the total bounty fees secured by the bug hunters you refer for their first 6 months.

features.title: Empower Ethical Hacking
features.text: Build a community that values integrity, innovation, and impactful solutions.

features.title: Refer Bug hunters
features.text: Invite cybersecurity researchers skilled in ethical hacking to join Cyberbay.

features.title: Seamless Registration
features.text: Ensure your referrals complete our registration process and meet the eligibility standards for responsible hacking.

features.title: Reap the Rewards
features.text: Earn 5% of the bounty fees every time your referred hackers successfully contribute to our platform for the first 6 months.

features.title: Rewarding Referrals
features.text: Earn a 5% referral fee on the total bounty fees secured by the bug hunters you refer for the first 6 months.

features.title: Empower Ethical Hacking
features.text: Support a mission-driven program focused on responsible vulnerability disclosure and proactive security measures.
